alert.note: Alert for Bennington; Western Windham (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 04 at 12:43PM EST until March 04 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow. An additional 1 to 2 inches is possible. Total snow accumulations of 10 to 16 inches. * WHERE...The western and southern Adirondacks, Upper Hudson Valley, Lake George region, and southern Vermont. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult due to snow covered roadways and reduced visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The combination of strong winds and the weight of the snow may lead to downed tree branches resulting in some power outages.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
